Package it.polimi.ingsw.xmlParser

Class ConfigurationParser

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.xmlParser.ConfigurationParser
public class ConfigurationParser
extends java.lang.Object
this class gives the methods used to parse the configuration file and to extract the main features of a game. This class works on files that are contained in the Resource directory of the project

    • getRoot

      protected static org.w3c.dom.Element getRoot​(java.lang.String file) throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException, org.xml.sax.SAXException, java.io.IOException
      this method opens a file and creates the root containing the elements that we want to parse.
      Parameters:
      file - is the name of the file that contains the cards
      Returns:
      the root of the file
      Throws:
      javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - if a DocumentBuild cannot be created
      org.xml.sax.SAXException - if any parse errors occur
      java.io.IOException - if any IO errors occur

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      is the value of the id
